name: cement production, CEM II/A-V | hard coal ash | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/20529/documentation

The dataset describes the production of cement (CEM II/A-V);CEM II/A-V is a blended cement that is made by partially replacing 6-20% of Portland cement with fly ash which is a waste from power stations.;Portland cement production involves the chemical transformation of raw materials: calcium oxides; silica; alumina and iron oxide into various types of cementitious products, by-products and wastes. The Portland cement manufacturing process consists of four main steps: (1) Quarrying of limestone and transportation of raw materials to the processing plant. (2) Preparation of “raw meal” for pyroprocessing (3) Pyroprocessing of raw materials to produce Portland cement clinker using the dry process. (4) Final grinding of the clinker together with inter-grinding with a small proportion of gypsum to produce Portland cement. Steps (1) to (4) are not considered in dataset.

From cradle, i.e. including all upstream activities. As source of gypsum, waste gypsum from flue gas treatment is assumed.

This activity ends with the cement produced in the cement mill. The dataset does not include packaging and administration.
category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/239:Manufacture of non-metallic mineral products n.e.c./2394:Manufacture of cement, lime and plaster

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: The dataset represents the Portland cement production for South Africa.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: In South Africa, all cement production is through dry kiln process. The clinker is ground in mills with gypsum (5%) and depending on the type of cement and technical standard (SAN 50197-1) with other materials such as blast furnace slag, fly ash, pozzolan and lime fillers to produce the Portland cement.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Some of the data were taken from the "cement production, Portland cement, GLO" dataset accessed 20170510. Some of the values were calculated based on primary data collection in South Africa"

exchanges.description: Values were calculated based on primary data collection in South Africa. The data were collected from 5 cement companies which represent 90% of the cement market share.
